content: द्रोहः [द्रुह् भावे-घञ्] {@--1@} Plotting against, seeking to hurt or assail, injury, mischief, malice; अद्रोहशपथं कृत्वा <ls>Pt. 2. 35</ls>; <ls>Bg. 1. 38</ls>; <ls>Ms. 2. 161</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">7. 48</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">9. 17.</ls> {@--2@} Treachery, perfidy. {@--3@} Wrong, offence. {@--4@} Rebellion.
